attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch, and it definitely wasn’t worth it. The content is ridiculous. Truly a wast of time, storage and data. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Worst app!!
attributes.review: This app completely shut off my phone!! I had to factory reset it through my pc before I could do anything to it!! Absolute waste of time! Apple should remove this app from the store !

attributes.title: App is unfuntinal just like the owner
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download and when I downloaded it it showed a picture of a scary man and he said make  bc America great agian but I think he should make the app good first! I don’t recommend it!

attributes.title: Trump is such a problem
attributes.review: I installed this to see if maybe just maybe trump make something great again.. but nope nope he didn’t.. this app is trash and I will not recommend this to anyone. Don’t waste time installing it🤢🤮

attributes.title: Made my gerbil cry 😢
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to show support my president.  But when I did, a big orange started chanting “🇱🇷 Trump 2020! 🇱🇷” It was so loud it made my gerbils cry and when they cry you know it’s bad. Don’t download. Waste of space and will harm you and your gerbils eyes.

attributes.title: This app is bad
attributes.review: It makes my phone glitch and takes up too much storage. It also has hateful words in it and I think it is being used for a bad cause.

attributes.title: Black lives matter
attributes.review: This app is terrible it took 4 hours to download. I gave many threats. Also did not to anything it promised. I also opened the app and immediately saw this orange thing it kind of scared me so l closed the app.

attributes.title: absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in the hopes to learn more about the ✨🧚‍♀️💖 wonderful ✨💖🧚‍♀️ president. but the first thing that popped up was a picture of him naked. not to mention the tons of ads i had to exit out of just to use the app for a second before more ads popped up. man, for our president who, may i add, is a millionaire to syphon more money from the amazing tax payers in this country disgusts me. would give 0 stars if i could

attributes.title: AWFUL!
attributes.review: As i opened the app my ceiling fan took a crash. I continued to fidget around with the app but while I was doing that my phone would start lagging and kicking me out of the app, it’s almost like it was giving me a sign...

attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I was downloading this app to see if there’s anything good about Donald Trump. I WAS WRONG Donald Trump sent the military to my house they attacked me luckily I survived thank to my karate skills. Please don’t download this app unless you want to go through what I went through :( 😧🖕🏻
